Elijah Lee, Independent Financial Advisor at Phillip Securities (Jurong East Lite)Top Contributor (Sep)Level 9. God of WisdomAnswered 3w agoHi anon, are you referring to the source of information? If that is the case, for stocks, I prefer to refer to the annual report of the company for my data and conduct my own analysis on them.For starters , you can tryhttp://reitdata.com/https://www.investing.com/ SGX stocks screenerIf you are looking for a source in terms of strategy, I would advise you to do some reading and develop your own philosophy.0 comments2
